name: Zefyr Rose "Read Scenes of Subjection" Lisowski

content: Thinking once again about the Japanese promotional event in 2017 where the ghosts from "The Ring" and "The Grudge" film franchises played baseball against each other

photo.alt: Sadako, the main antagonist of the movie Ringu, stands with a mitt on a baseball field. Her long black hair flows over her face and she is wearing a white stained dress.
The main antagonist of the Grudge, with bloody face, dark hair, and a stained red dress, steps up to the plate, bat in her hand swinging slightly behind her right shoulder.
the cat-boy from the grudge, with pale white skin and a bowl cut, sits, looking lightly melancholic, on the green turf of the field.
